keil.c51.uv4path.description:
Absolute path to C51 UV4.exe (in .wine). Example: `C:/Keil_v5/UV4/UV4.exe`

Please ensure the path is correct, otherwise the extension will not work properly.
keil.mdk.uv4path.description:
Absolute path to MDK UV4.exe (in .wine). Example: `C:/Keil_v5/UV4/UV4.exe`

Please ensure the path is correct, otherwise the extension will not work properly.
keil.wine.path.description: Path to wine executable. Leave empty to use wine from system PATH
keil.wine.prefix.description: Absolute path to wine prefix. Example: `/home/wine/.wine`, Leave empty to use path `~/.wine`
keil.project.exclude.description: uVision project file name exclude list
keil.flash.device.description: Flash device name, such as ST-LINK V2
keil.flash.st-flashPath.description: Absolute path to st-flash executable. Example: `/usr/local/bin/st-flash`, Leave empty to use st-flash from system PATH
